homepage_ar_caption:
AR technology overlays the actual scene with some computer-generated virtual objects, to enrich the overall view on your
Apple & Android devices.
homepage_category_caption: There are many categories to help you find the right product easily.
homepage_experience_place_caption:
You can experience the web anywhere as long as it has
an internet connection.
homepage_experience_place_device: Works with all operating systems, browsers, and devices.
homepage_experience_place_player: High-quality online 3D player on the web.
homepage_featured_caption: Millions of high-quality products, optimized for a variety of uses.
homepage_product_title: Millions of 3D models for your work
explore_best_selling_summary: Exclusive 3D models are ready to be used for VFX, game development, VR/AR, architecture, animation, and much more. File formats include FBX, OBJ, MAX, C4D, BLEND, and GLTF. 3D preview & model inspector are also available for all 3D models.
explore_category_general_description: Professional 3D models ready to be used for VFX, game development, VR/AR, architecture, animation, and much more. File formats include FBX, OBJ, MAX, C4D, BLEND and GLTF. 3D Preview & model inspector available for all 3D models.
explore_search_result_empty_description: Please modify filters or choose a different category
blog_banner_caption: We wrote you worth reading blogs
help_center_caption:
If you have trouble using VRStyler's service, please
contact us by clicking the button below.
help_center_search_placeholder: Search by keyword (e.g. payment, password, login...)

checkout_paying_remind: Please stay on this page, do not close or reload the page to complete the payment process.
checkout_paypal_method_caption: In order to complete your transaction, we will transfer you over to PayPal's secure servers.
checkout_success_caption:
The product has been moved to the "Models" folder

checkout_success_sub_title: Thanks a lot for putting up this order

modeling_order_checkout_success_caption: Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you. You will receive an email notification when your order is complete.

modeling_order_product_feedback_attachme: Only upload up to 5 images in JPG, WEBP, PNG, JPEG and less than 2MB
modeling_order_quote_fail_while_attachme: A quote cannot be requested while attachments are being uploaded.
modeling_order_request_quote_success_not: We will notify you by email when your order is quoted.
modeling_order_request_quote_warning: While waiting for a quote, you will not be able to edit this order.
modeling_order_save_fail_while_attachmen: Orders cannot be saved while attachments are being uploaded.
modeling_service_dashboard_caption: A platform to seamlessly upload photos, place orders, and manage models
modeling_service_faq_caption: Can't find the answer to your question? Write to us and we will answer you via email.
modeling_service_order_product_reject_ad: Sorry, you can only add up to 10 products.
modeling_service_price_caption: Free of setup fees, lock-in fees, fees, and annual fees

Experience VRStyler's

register_form_password_not_match: The two passwords that you entered do not match!
register_form_password_valid:
• Minimum 8 characters and maximum 16 characters
  • Does not contain whitespace or emojis
  • Contains at least one lowercase character.
  • Contains at least one uppercase letter.
  • Contains at least one special character.
register_form_username_valid:
• The length must be between 4 and 20 characters.
  • The accepted characters: a-z A-Z 0-9 underline(_).
  • It's not allowed to have two or more consecutive underlines in a row.
  • It's not allowed to start the username with a underline.
register_success_caption: Please check your {{email}} to confirm and complete registration!
register_sale_fail_description: Please verify your account to be able to register as a seller on VRStyler. Do you want to verify your account now ?

dashboard_theme_decoration_banner_carous: A banner carousel is a type of advertising banner that features a series of consecutive images that automatically move or shift when users swipe left or right. It is typically positioned at the top of a website and used to showcase products or services, as well as introduce offers, promotions, or the latest information about a product or brand. Banner carousels can include unique images, creative graphic ads, or attractive advertising messages.

• Length: 800-1340px, Vertical: 300-800px.
  • Up to 2MB per image.
  • Image format JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP.
  • Select up to 3 images.
Used to promote products, brands, promotions, or ongoing events on VRStyler.
dashboard_theme_decoration_delete_confir: Are you sure you want to do it? Once done, it cannot be undone.
dashboard_theme_decoration_image_banner_: Buttons 1, 2, and 3 correspond to the number of images in the carousel.

Image banner is a simple and effective advertising tool that showcases a product or brand with one image. It is placed prominently to attract customers and can feature attractive images or messages. It increases customer interaction and traffic, and is cost-saving for businesses on VRStyler.

• Length: 800-1340px, Vertical: 300-800px.
  • Up to 2MB per image.
  • Image format JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP.
This is a simple type of advertising banner, containing only one image, placed in a convenient location to attract customer attention.
dashboard_theme_decoration_product_carou: Featured Products are specifically selected and prominently displayed on an e-commerce website or sales funnel to attract customer attention, improve product visibility, and increase sales for showroom owners.

become_seller_caption_first: Quality work and fair pricing are critical to the success of our sellers and the VRStyler Store as a whole.
become_seller_caption_second: In order to become a seller, we will review your portfolio to see if it meets the following criteria:
become_seller_list_first: Make sure your VRStyler portfolio is representative of your work.
become_seller_list_second: All models, textures, and/or animations must be your original property.
become_seller_list_thirty: Work is modeled to an acceptable industry standard in keeping with other sellers in the store.
become_seller_list_fifty: Thumbnails, titles, and descriptions accurately reflect the items for sale.
become_seller_list_sixty: Models are accurately UV mapped when UVs are used.
become_seller_list_eighty: Textures (when used) and materials are optimized and efficient.
become_seller_check_second: conditions and terms to become a seller
BRAND_NOT_EXIST: Brand has been changed by the owner or does not exist. Please reload the page!
CATEGORY_NOT_EXIST: Category has been changed by the owner or does not exist.
CATEGORY_SHOWROOM_NOT_EXIST: Category showroom has been changed by the owner or does not exist. Please reload the page!
COUPON_CANNOT_BE_USED: Coupon cannot be used for this order
COUPON_IS_CHANGE: There was an error while applying your coupon. Please try again.
DATA_INVALID: An error occurred. Please reload this page and try again
DISCONNECT_INTERNET: Please check your internet connection and try again.
FEEDBACK_IS_DOING: Your feedback has been approved, we will notify you when completed
FEEDBACK_IS_PROCESSING: This product has submitted feedback, please reload the page!
FEEDBACK_IS_REJECT: Your feedback has been rejected, please reload feedback page for more details
FORBIDDEN: You don't have permission to execute this request
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: You don't have enough money to withdraw, please try again later!
IS_OWN_ITEM: You cannot buy your own product
ITEM_HAS_BEEN_DELETE: Review failed because this product was removed by VRStyler, please reload the page
ITEM_IS_CHANGE: The product that you add has been changed. Please try again!
ITEM_NOT_FOUND: This product does not exist, please reload the page!
ITEMS_EXIST_IN_CART_LOCAL: Item already exist in your shopping cart!
ITEMS_EXIST_IN_CART: Item already exist in your shopping cart. Please reload the page!
LICENSE_NOT_EXIST: License has been changed by the owner or does not exist. Please reload the page!
LIMIT_DOWNLOAD: You can only download up to 10 models per day.
LIST_PRODUCT_EMPTY: Please add at least 1 product to get a quote
PAYMENT_ERROR: Something went wrong with the payment. Please use a different payment method or try again later!
PRODUCT_INACTIVE: There are hidden products, please try again.
PRODUCT_NOT_EXIST: This product does not exist, please reload the page!
REVIEW_HAS_REPLIED: Review has replied. Please reload the page!
THEME_NOT_FOUND: This theme does not exist, please reload the page and try again!
TOKEN_NOT_CORRECT: Your session has expired, please log in again.
TOTAL_ORDER_IS_CHANGE: There have been products whose prices have been changed. Please check your shopping cart again.
USER_NOT_FOUND_OR_WRONG_PASSWORD: Incorrect login information. Please check your username or password!
WRONG_PASSWORD: Old password is incorrect. Please try again
